anytime: 明白事理的人讓自己適應世界
不要浪費時間活在別人的生活裡

別人不喜歡你不需介意。
人活下來，不是為了取悅別人
自由，是在一切事物上，有自我掌控的能力
把今天照顧好，明天才能更好
智者解決問題，天才預防問題
morning: Don't waste time living someone else's life.
However long the night, the dawn will break.

Intellectuals solve problems
geniuses prevent them.
afternoon: You're more fun than bubble wrap!
evening: You made someone smile today, I know it.
The day was better for your efforts.
